messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

after introducing the data a project setup form the data is still blank request commercial setup secure info assigned hi we got setup request through setup form we noticed one fields normally would get populated after introducing data was filled one still blank field subtype check before while completing end setup form field was populated with direct case should be same however can you please check thank you best regards engineer sent wednesday december request commercial setup secure info assigned hello please be advised record number assigned your please review details take appropriate action reference number details null please choose one following setup null commercial client commercial null client details customer name customer entity domain customer organization sector brief description proof concept extract information scanned forms code null details name secure info code type agile template name agile start date end date bid margin manager offer software engineering proposition digital proposition agile yes proposition automation yes components language other database platform offers cost recovery yes category commercial projects subtype check contract type fixed price delivered comments code closure date please select you want phone address location line manager help better understand your needs tune future better match them can job but lowers productivity up null ready submit location access request please click following link kind regards generated please ref msg
